TopicTitle: Repost of my WIP Pluto Analog

Articles.Content: So much hate and i didnt have time enough to post because i am having really bad connection and i im pretty new to the forum and didn't know about that with the code stuff. I also said that i could scrap the project and do something else if you didnt want me looking in the code for the planets were done and make a tiny one like 170billion meters away with white surfaces. Just wanted to clear things out because im a moderately experienced C programmer and Unity guy.

Um, what is this, I dont get what:

A: You are talking about

B: Why are you putting this in addon releases and project showcase?

Well, since your new, I guess thats why.
Moderator Comment: Thread is better suited to 'General Add-On Affairs', thread moved. Remember to be civil and polite throughout the topic, we don't want a repeat of last time. Thanks.
Just post a screenshot and I think the hate will go away. Even a grey sphere would get me excited.

Check this thread out Nutt007, he shows the beginnings of the planet at least, hopefully more will come soon

To be honest though, this thread is kinda unnecessary now as well so I might as well close it.
